text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today, the tryouts—a multitude of<n>races highlighting
up-and-coming<n>students—are being held. This is their<n>
chance to get scouted and make it<n>big.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's still early in the morning, but as I<n>look over at the track, I
spy a student<n>already running laps.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Whew! Okay, one more lap—no, ten<n>more laps!
choice_data_list:
Be careful not to overwork yourself right before
the tryouts.

Be careful not to overwork yourself right before
the tryouts.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
No worries! So far, this has been<n>nothing more than a
warm-up!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
After all, I'm El Condor Pasa! The<n>racer whose wings are
destined to<n>unfurl and soar across the world<n>some day!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Wait! We're totally talkin' like we<n>know each other... Who
are you?!
choice_data_list:
I'm just a trainer who's here to watch the
tryouts.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: You're a trainer?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
If that's the case, then could it be...<n>that you've come here
to scout me?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The tryouts haven't even started yet,<n>and you're telling me
you've already<n>got your eye on my ability, talent, and<n>
potential?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Bueno! I'm glad you came to say hi! I<n>respect your passion
and drive!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She's not hearing me out!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Unfortunately, I have to decline your<n>offer for now.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
...Why, you ask? Even though you<n>want to scout me right
now, why do I<n>not accept your offer?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: The answer is simple! Trainer, I wantyou to watch me today! Watch me intoday's tryouts, and then judge my abilities!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
A passionate bond of trust with her<n>trainer is necessary for
the world's<n>strongest racer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: That's why I want you to judge me<n>properly, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
...Oh, but you didn't call out to me<n>before the tryouts in vain!
♪ I'll give<n>you one El point for your troubles!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Whoa! It's almost time for my race.<n>Catch ya later—ciao! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa's feet take flight as<n>she dashes away,
leaving me behind.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Finally, the tryouts begin in earnest.<n>There, the
top-performing runner is...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa! She's taken the<n>lead! Nobody can catch
up!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: What magnificent form! In first place,<n>El Condor Pasa!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
La victoria! I'm the best, the greatest,<n>the one to beat all the
rest!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She left her competition in the dust in<n>the final stretch! She's
head and<n>shoulders above the competition!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Why, we might just have a prodigy in<n>the making on our
hands!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Heheheh... I can hear it—the crowd<n>cheerin' for the world's
strongest<n>racer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
All right, it's scouting time! Which one<n>of you trainers wants
to conquer the<n>world with me?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: El Condor Pasa! Please let me scout<n>you!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: No wait, pick me! I'll give you the<n>wings you need to fly!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ooh, bueno! ♪ Now that's what I like<n>to hear!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: But what I'm lookin' for is apartner I can trust! Which means...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: A duel! A contest! It's time for the<n>Scouting Championship!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: The Scouting Championship?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Sí! When it comes to trainers, it's<n>their training programs
that count!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Therefore, I want each of you to come<n>up with a training
program fit for<n>me—the world's strongest racer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
And if I vibe enough with one of your<n>programs, then I'll
accept the scoutin'<n>offer from the trainer who came up<n>
with it!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: I see... It's a training program<n>showdown!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Challenge accepted! I'll come up with<n>the perfect program
for you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The trainers around El Condor Pasa<n>soon disperse, leaving
only me<n>standing in front of her.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
And lastly, we have... you! The trainer<n>who was overflowing
with passion!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
How-ever! Unfortunately for you, I'm<n>not giving you special
treatment.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That said... just between you and me,<n>I'm really lookin'
forward to whatever<n>training program you come up with! ♪

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: You did cut the line and try toscout me before I even raced, after all.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I expect great things, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, I get to work drafting up a<n>training program for El
Condor Pasa.
